text:
Support for Transparent Videos
All modern browsers support transparent video, however HubSpot doesn’t allow you to store the videos in the file manager (as it automatically converts them to unsupported formats).
It would be great if HubSpot allowed storing of h265 encoded files
There’s more information here:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Support-for-Transparent-Videos/idi-p/801016#M145011>
Please upvote the post ^
